steps.title: Quick
steps.description: I download the app and complete my profile in less than 5 minutes.

steps.title: Free
steps.description: I receive an immediate analysis based on the AI to discover my situation and understand how to improve it.

steps.title: Anonymous
steps.description: I let the invstoreÂ® algorithm match my profile with the best experts and opportunities without my identity or my coordinates being disclosed.

steps.title: Simple
steps.description: I receive directly in the application personalized recommendations and product offers from independent bank and wealth management experts.

steps.title: Controlled
steps.description: I accept a first telephone exchange only with the one or ones who have the best response to my need.

steps.title: Efficient
steps.description: I choose my new advisor who guides me step by step in the last steps of the experience.

steps.title: Innovative
steps.description: If I want, I can connect all my bank accounts for free to manage my finances directly from a single application.

step1.option1: I don't really know what I'm looking for, finance has never really interested me.
step1.option2: I have a clear goal in mind, but I don't know which product it corresponds to.
step1.option3: I know the subject well, I know the product I need.

step2.option1: I don't have a clear idea, I would like to receive advice and offers adapted to my situation.
step2.option2: I want to invest in the stock market.
step2.option3: I think about the future and want to prepare for retirement.
step2.option4: I need to pay less taxes, I need to tax optimization.
step2.option5: I want to be dynamic and my savings to be dynamic as well, I want them to earn more.
step2.option6: I need to protect my children, it's time to talk about inheritance.
step2.option7: I would like to know how to diversify my assets to reduce risks.
step2.option8: I want to participate in the collective effort by funding the real economy.
step2.option9: I want to give meaning to my money and I want to know more about responsible savings.
step2.option10: I am afraid of the unexpected and I want to form a safety savings.
